<noinclude>{{month|July}}
Events that occurred on 13 July
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1949]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 121]].
* '''[[1967]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] finishes writing [[letter 295b]].
* '''[[1979]]''' - [[Mythcon 10]] in [[wikipedia:San Jose, California|San Jose, California]].
* '''[[2004]]''' - [[The Lord of the Rings Symphony]] at Mann Centre in [[wikipedia:Philadelphia|Philadelphia]].
* '''[[2006]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The White Council]]'' is announced.
* '''[[2004]]''' - [[Tolkien Thing|Tolkien Thing VII]] in [[wikipedia:Hohenahr|Hohensolms, Hohenahr]], [[wikipedia:Germany|Germany]].
* '''[[2005]]''' - [[Tolkien Thing|Tolkien Thing VI]] in [[wikipedia:Hohenahr|Hohensolms, Hohenahr]], [[wikipedia:Germany|Germany]].
* '''[[2007]]''' - [[Tolkien Thing|Tolkien Thing IX]] in [[wikipedia:Diez, Germany|Diez]], [[wikipedia:Germany|Germany]].
* '''[[2008]]''' - [[Tolkien Thing|Tolkien Thing X]] in [[wikipedia:Rieneck|Rieneck]], [[wikipedia:Germany|Germany]].
* '''[[2013]]''' - [[Mythcon 44]] at [[wikipedia:Michigan State University|Michigan State University]], [[wikipedia:East Lansing, Michigan|East Lansing]].
